verbose_text: In 2001, Wiesgigl and Clos [XREF_BIBR] observed that the inactivation of L. donovani HSP90 by GA induces growth arrest in the G2 Phase of the cell cycle of the promastigote stage as well as the differentiation from the promastigote to the amastigote stage.
evidence: HSP90 by GA induces growth arrest in the G2 Phase of the cell cycle of the promastigote stage as well as the differentiation
